author: Ms.Bossy
text: Received my Flyknit vapormax 3 triple black and they're definitely fake. However, I had been out of town when they arrived and didn't open the box until a week later to visually see them. Shoes were over $350, just money wasted. If stockx really checks authenticity how could they miss that the shoes were fake? When u open the box first view I knew. Then I compared them to an actual video of the REAL ones and again DIFFERENT. Really disappointed a lot of money wasted!
title: Received my Flyknit vapormax 3 triple…

author: Unable to cancel
text:
Somehow between switching back and forth between sizes we ended up
With the wrong size in our order.  We immediately recognized error but could not cancel.  Now we are paying for shipping and transaction fees twice.
title: Beware that you are locked in once you place order

author: Emani
text: Scammers sold my money 800
title: Scammers sold my money 800

author: Soroush
text: I paid for my order to be arrived 7-12 days. Its been 2 weeks and I haven’t received my order. I think it’s unfair to pay for delivery at this point.
title: I paid for my order to be arrived 7-12…

author: Eli Ali
text:
when you place an order and the website declines, you should wait a moment and verify if the payment went through. 

I bought sneakers and the website said something went wrong with the process (please verify your purchase). The next two days I saw two charges in my credit card for the same pair of shoes. 

Needless to say, Stock X has a policy that you can’t return or cancel an order once it’s placed. Even if the problem was on their end. 

Only option I guess is for you to resell your item which could take months and you’re not guaranteed to get back what you paid for. So there you have it. 

Be forewarned
title: Please be aware of this!!!

author: Kelly
text: Order got canceled on time and there was another delay took a long time to get the shoes
title: Order got canceled on time and there…

author: Olivia
text: Items I received were slightly damaged and doesn’t fit, I was told basically there’s nothing that can be done, was offered $20 credit  or partial refund for an item I paid $140, and when I asked if there was another option communications stopped.
title: Never again

author: Mike
text: The sales tax, processing fee, and shipping fee was bit too much! And for that money we’re paying it took way to long to get it. Took almost over a half a month and I still haven’t received it yet! The plus side is you know your getting the real thing! No fakes!
title: Review

author: Hamza Kara
text: UPS lost the parcel but willing to refund through StockX as the parcel label is generated by StockX. Have been dealing with SX customer service for over a month and listening to excuses, e-mails being ignored. UPS have sent StockX notification they have taken liability and just need to process payment procedure but for some reason StockX won't co-operate. This is at no cost to StockX except to help a customer.
title: Stockx unhelpful in getting refund for lost parcel

author: Stephanie
text: I put my order in 2 weeks ago and said by the 30th I would get my shoes I’ve waited only to get an email to say their was a DELAY this is my first time buying from here and probably my last.
title: I put my order in 2 weeks ago and said…

author: Melany Aylor
text: I’m unable to track my order. I’ve already paid for shoes that have been delayed and haven’t even shipped. Right now, I wouldn’t buy again and am thinking of attempting to cancel my order.
title: Unhappy
